setup_instructions:
# Training Setup Instructions for Malaysian TinyLlama-SigLIP

## Prerequisites
1. Install compatible versions:
   pip install torch>=2.0.0
   pip install transformers>=4.35.0
   pip install accelerate
   pip install datasets
   pip install Pillow

## Model Information
- Model: mesolitica/malaysian-tinyllama-1.1b-siglip-large-384-vision
- Size: ~1.1B parameters (3.3GB)
- Type: Multimodal Vision-Language Model
- Input: 384x384 images + text prompts
- Languages: English, Malay

## Dataset Information
- Total Images: 9,504
- Categories: 9 waste types
- Image Size: 524x524 (will resize to 384x384)
- Format: JPEG, RGB mode
- Distribution: Reasonably balanced (ratio 2.90)

## Training Configuration
- Learning Rate: 1e-5 to 5e-5
- Batch Size: 4-8 (depending on GPU)
- Epochs: 3-5
- Optimizer: AdamW
- Scheduler: Linear with warmup
- Data Split: 80% train, 20% validation
